page.title: 15Land Cover.
page.content: A large part of our area is covered by reeds,marsh and saltings.Through this area flows the River Neath.There are many pills and small streams.Because the river is tidal this area is often swamped with water.When the tide is out cows and horses are grazed on this land.There are several tracks and small roads crossing the land.The marsh is bordered by a railway line. Another area is mainly taken up with industry.This includes the Metal Box factory,the Galvanised Steel works and the old site of the Eaglesbush foundry. The rest of the area is made up of housing,shops and some play areas.The houses are mainly terraced with many flats for senior citizens being developed.
